description:
The battle in the Digital World ended in victory for the Digimon and humans who joined forces and fought together. One year after that battle...
Tagiru Akashi, a member of the Xros Heart street basketball team, has set his sights on surpassing his respected senior, Taiki Kudou, and his classmate, Yuu Amano, to become the team`s top star. But then, in the midst of these peaceful days, a mysterious boy and his companions appear before Taiki. In warning, the boy tells Taiki, "Don`t try to get involved in what`s about to happen in this town," and disappears...
Clueless to what`s going on in the town, Tagiru visits an arcade. There he experiences a strange sensation, as though the flow of time around him is thrown off kilter. Then he senses an unknown presence lurking around the area...
Tagiru hears the voice of someone who seems to be injured and follows it through a distorted space in the air, finding himself in a world called "DigiQuartz," where time progresses differently from that of the real world. In DigiQuartz, Tagiru watches as a team of two boys and a girl hunt a monster they call a Digimon. This is the very trio that had appeared before Taiki with the warning to steer clear - Ryouma, Ren, and Airu.
Tagiru then meets Gumdramon, the owner of the voice that had spoken to him in the arcade, and saves him from being hunted by Ryouma and his companions. Tagiru instantly befriends Gumdramon and they decide to join the Digimon Hunt together. Then Tagiru visits a watchmaker`s shop on the outskirts of town, where the mysterious old Watchmaker, rumored among many Digimon Hunters, gives him a Xros Loader.
Returning to DigiQuartz, Tagiru then encounters MetalTyrannomon. He immediately attempts a Digimon Hunt, but he and Gumdramon are soon backed into a tight spot by MetalTyrannomon`s counterattack. Just then the Xros Loader begins to glow, and Gumdramon Digivolves into Arresterdramon! With his greatly heightened power, he defeats MetalTyrannomon, ending Tagiru`s first Digimon Hunt in success.
Thus the Hunter boys Taiki, Tagiru, and Yuu begin a brand new adventure as they go on to Hunt the Digimon that appear in the human world!

REGULAR.description:
The new chapter in the Digimon Xros Wars series, Time Traveling Hunter Boys, finally begins! The story takes place one year after the battle with the Death Generals. Taiki has started a basketball team, Xros Heart, with his school underclassmen Yuu and Tagiru. Life has been peaceful. Then, one day, the air before Taiki flickers and a monstrous shadow flashes before his eyes. He then meets three mysterious characters - Ryouma, Ren, and Airu - who tell him "This town may become a bit chaotic. Our own game is about to begin." What could these words mean...?!
The next day, Tagiru hears the voice of a Digimon on the verge of death, Gumdramon. This leads him to DigiQuartz, a game world inhabited by Digimon. Fascinated by a Digimon Hunt he witnesses there, Tagiru teams up with Gumdramon and starts on his way to becoming a Digimon Hunter!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Oretachi, Digimon Hunter!
We Are Digimon Hunters!
おれたち, デジモンハンター!

REGULAR.description:
Students from Tagiru`s school are disappearing one after another! Meanwhile, Tagiru and Gumdramon have sensed something moving in the Digimon realm, DigiQuartz. Following its trail, they discover someone, or something, carrying a boy from Tagiru`s school... Tagiru rushes to follow him, but then he`s attacked by Sagomon, a Digimon that looks like a kappa! As even experienced Digimon Hunters call Sagomon a tough customer, Tagiru and Gumdramon are no match for his fierce attacks...
Soon after, Tagiru confronts Sagomon again. He Digivolves Gumdramon in an attempt to capture Sagomon, but they are only pushed back further. When Taiki, who has been watching their struggle, declares "I can`t turn my back on them!", Shoutmon hears him and responds. After reloading from Taiki`s Xros Loader, Shoutmon Digivolves and gains further power through a DigiXros fusion. He then launches his attack on Sagomon! How will their battle end?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seito-tachi ga Kieta! Yurameku Sagomon no Kage
Students Are Disappearing! The Wavering Shadow of Sagomon
生徒たちが消えた! ゆらめくサゴモンの影

REGULAR.description:
An email from Pinocchimon appears on the computer used by the robot club at Tagiru`s school. Pinocchimon shows Tokio and the other club members a blueprint and some parts and asks them to help him build a robot, luring them to the Digimon world, DigiQuartz. From that day onward, Tokio and the other club members turn up absent from school. As requested by the teacher, Tagiru visits Tokio`s house accompanied by Taiki and Yuu. When he sees Tokio working on building a robot as if possessed, Tagiru grows suspicious and decides to observe his movements. Tagiru and the others then watch as Tokio opens an email and enters DigiQuartz through a portal that opens in his computer screen! They rush after him and find themselves in an industrial area in DigiQuartz. They call upon the strengths of their Digimon companions Gumdramon and Shoutmon to locate Tokio and resume the chase. When they follow Tokio into a factory, they find a nearly completely assembled GigaBreakdramon...?!
Tagiru and the others try to bring Tokio back from DigiQuartz, but at that moment Pinocchimon appears and starts up GigaBreakdramon. A new battle begins - how will it end?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Robot-bu no Yume, Pinocchimon no Yuuwaku
The Robot Club`s Dream, Pinocchimon`s Temptation
ロボット部の夢, ピノッキモンの誘惑

REGULAR.description:
When Tagiru`s classmate Miho Sudo grows jealous of the school`s higher-ranked honor students, she ends up possessed by a Digimon! The next day something strange happens to the top two honor students, Mishima and Takahashi, in the middle of class. Their skin suddenly turns brown and they appear to wither, as if something is sucking the nutrients out of them. Sensing that this is a Digimon`s doing, Tagiru warps to the Digimon world, DigiQuartz. There he sees strange things that look like plant vines scattered throughout the school and wrapped around Mishima and Takahashi, as if to conceal them. Tagiru and Gumdramon attempt to find out just how far the vines reach. Just then the Digimon Hunter Ren appears and tells Tagiru that the vines themselves are a Digimon, and a very strong one that keeps its true form hidden. When Ren has his Digimon partner Dracmon bite through a vine, Miho, back in the real world, appears to feel intense pain. Then the Digimon that had wrapped itself completely around Miho and assimilated her body, Blossomon, appears!
When Miho and Blossomon warp to DigiQuartz, a fierce battle with Tagiru and company begins!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honor Students Are Targeted! Blossomon`s Smile
Yuutousei ga Nerawareta! Blossomon no Bishou
優等生が狙われた! ブロッサモンの微笑

REGULAR.description:
Yuu still hasn`t forgotten the pain caused by the loss of his Digimon partner, Damemon. When the Digimon Hunter Airu sees one of Yuu`s long-cherished Digimon, Cutemon, her heart is instantly taken! In order to steal Cutemon, she takes Yuu to the Digimon world, DigiQuartz, and traps him. Cutemon tries desperately to save him, but his strength is nowhere near enough... Tagiru and Gumdramon manage to save Yuu and Cutemon once, but of course, Airu has no intention of giving up! She continues to relentlessly pursue Cutemon. Eventually the Digimon Hunters Ryouma and Ren, along with Tagiru, Taiki, Shoutmon, and Dorulumon, also become involved in the heated conflict...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cuteness Caution! The Cute Hunter, Airu`s Trap!
Kawaisa Youchuui! Cute Hunter, Airu no Wana!
かわいさ要注意! キュートハンター, アイルの罠!

REGULAR.description:
Ninth grader and master swordsman Musashi Kenzaki, who sees Taiki as his rival, begins to undergo kendo training with a Digimon named Kotemon. As this goes on, incidents of rampant test attacks begin to occur! Sensing that a Digimon might be involved, Tagiru sets out on a Digimon Hunt with Gumdramon. They then discover that Musashi is behind the test attacks. Musashi insists that he was fighting fair and square, that they were proper duels and not test attacks, but in the next moment he`s surrounded by a black aura...! Is it Kotemon`s doing, or is another Digimon behind this...?! Tagiru and company take a stand to find the truth behind Musashi`s black aura!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Digimon Kendo Match! The Blade of Kotemon Approaches!!
Digimon Kendou Shoubu! Kotemon no Yaiba ga Semaru!!
デジモン剣道勝負! コテモンの刃が迫る!!

REGULAR.description:
Tagiru is on the Hunt for a Digimon that loves the smell of okonomiyaki, called Pagumon. The next day a Digimon called Jagamon, who makes people eating potato chips float in the air and disappear, suddenly turns up. Tagiru reloads Gumdramon to Hunt Jagamon, but they fail because of Pagumon. This causes Tagiru and Gumdramon to argue, and Gumdramon enters the rival Hunter Ryouma`s Xros Loader! Tagiru and Gumdramon are thus separated. In the midst of all this, Tagiru watches as something strange happens to Pagumon after chowing down on an okonomiyaki...
What will happen to Tagiru and Gumdramon`s friendship, and with Pagumon who has fallen into an unforeseen crisis?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Okonomiyaki Panic! A Town Full of Pagumon
Okonomiyaki Panic! Pagumon Darake no Machi
お好み焼きパニック! パグモンだらけの街

REGULAR.description:
A great number of Digimon called Zenimon appear in the shopping district, hanging out near cash registers and messing up the machines. Tagiru tries to hunt a Zenimon, but his target is snatched from him by a boy named Hideaki Mashimo. Tagiru and company make an agreement with Hideaki, who is only involved in the Digimon Hunt to make money and has no interest in Digimon at all, to capture Digimon together. As this goes on, Tagiru encounters a Digimon called Ganemon! They learn that the Zenimon are Ganemon`s underlings, but something happened and they all escaped. Ganemon asks them to help him recapture the Zenimon, so Tagiru and the others team up with him! However, soon enough something changes in Ganemon, sending the shopping district into a panic?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Digimon Hunt Daihanjou! Shotengai no Sugoude Hunter!
The Digimon Hunt is Booming! The Remarkable Shopping District Hunter!!
デジモンハント大繁盛! 商店街のスゴ腕ハンター!!

REGULAR.description:
Taiki meets his childhood friend Akari again, and the two of them find themselves attending a dinner buffet party at a luxury hotel. Tickets for this party are normally rare since the event is booked full all year round, but somehow Akari won the tickets from a supermarket giveaway. But, of course, Yuu is on the scene! It turns out the whole thing was a trap set by the super celebrity star Digimon, SuperStarmon, to catch the superstar Digimon Hunter, Taiki. When Taiki is taken to the Digimon world, DigiQuartz, Tagiru and the others set out to save him. How will their battle end...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nerawareta Taiki! Cho Serebu Suta no Otakebi!
The Digimon Hunt Thrives! The Remarkable Shopping District Hunter!!
狙われたタイキ! 超セレブ・スターの雄たけび!

REGULAR.description:
After receiving an urgent call for help from Nene, who is working as a popular idol in Hong Kong, Tagiru and his friends head to Hong Kong. Nene says she`s been having problems for about a week with a stalker in a mask following her around. Worse yet, when the police pursued the masked stalker, he escaped to DigiQuartz, the Digimon world! Tagiru suddenly becomes intent on protecting Nene, but it turns out the masked stalker is a powerful foe who uses Harpymon, a Digimon with extraordinary flying ability, in his schemes!
The strength of Nene`s Digimon, Sparrowmon, is essential to defeat Harpymon. Nene and Sparrowmon immediately join Tagiru and company as they all venture into battle together!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arrival in Hong Kong! Protect the Super Gorgeous Idol!!
Hong Kong Jouriku! Chou Bishounen Idol o Mamore!
香港上陸! 超美少女アイドルを守れ!!

REGULAR.description:
A Digimon that steals humans` motivation shows up. The Digimon, called FlaWizarmon, steals Tagiru`s motivation, leaving him limp and drained of energy. He`s left so listless, he can`t even make Gumdramon Digivolve. Meanwhile, FlaWizarmon continues to steal more and more people`s motivation. Taiki and Yuu, along with Shoutmon and the other Digimon, attempt to defeat FlaWizarmon and return Tagiru to normal. However, after absorbing Tagiru`s motivation, FlaWizarmon keeps getting back up no matter how many times they knock him down...!
What is the fate of Gumdramon, who`s caught in a major bind without his partner`s motivation...? Will Tagiru ever go back to being the super-motivated middle schooler he used to be?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tagiru Goes Limp?! Gumdramon`s in Trouble!!
Tagiru ga Funyafunya!? Gumdramon Dai Pinch!
タギルがふにゃふにゃ!?ガムドラモン大ピンチ!!

REGULAR.description:
Masaru is Tagiru`s classmate and the son of the owner of a ramen shop, Katsuji, which has seen a significant decline in customers recently. Determined to help his classmate, Tagiru vows to make Katsuji into the kind of ramen shop that customers will line up to get into. But just when he`s about to take action, Katsuji`s ramen changes dramatically and people start to form a long line to eat it. Lurking behind this change are the shadows of Digimon called Ogremon and Fugamon! Ogremon and Fugamon have opened a ramen shop in the Digimon world, DigiQuartz, but since business is poor, they approach Katsuji, Masaru`s father and the owner of the ramen shop Katsuji. They agree to cooperate using Ogremon and Fugamon`s superb noodles with Katsuji`s prized soup. Katsuji`s shop thrives as a result. However, at the same time, Katsuji`s kind temperament changes and he begins to yell at customers. Wanting his kind father back, Masaru decides to make his own ramen to open his father`s eyes. What will happen when Tagiru and company stand by his side in this ramen face-off?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Delicious? Disgusting? The Digimon Ramen Face-off!
Oishii? Mazui? Digimon Ramen Shoubu!
おいしい? まずい? デジモン・ラーメン勝負!

REGULAR.description:
Tagiru`s classmate, Kiichi, has begun riding on the locomotive Digimon, Locomon, and traveling to other countries every night. Eventually Kiichi and the other kids who spend all their time traveling with him start coming to school with very sleepy faces. Kiichi also starts to look thin and haggard. Worried, Tagiru and his friends decide to stop Kiichi from going on his trips. They start to board Locomon, but just then something happens! Ren, riding on Pteranomon, captures Locomon. Kiichi is stunned to see Locomon taken away and pleads for his return. Tagiru and company take Kiichi along to follow Locomon. Kiichi tries to persuade Locomon to come back to him. Will they succeed in granting Kiichi`s wish and taking Locomon back from Ren?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kodomo Dake no Sekai Ryokou! Yume no Digimon Train
World Travel for Kids Only! The Digimon Dream Train
子どもだけの世界旅行! 夢のデジモントレイン

REGULAR.description:
Tagiru, Taiki, and Yuu are invited to an event on a certain island where the strongest and most experienced Digimon Hunters can Hunt a powerful Digimon. When the event starts, they enter the forests in search of the powerful Digimon that lurks there, Volcdramon. Taiki and the others try to Hunt him, but the intense heat he unleashes makes it a difficult battle. Then, someone who didn`t enter the event joins in! Who could he be?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hunter Dai Shuugou! Minami no Shima no Digimon Soudatsusen!
The Great Gathering of Hunters! A Fierce Digimon Battle on a Southern Island!
ハンター大集合! 南の島のデジモン争奪戦!

REGULAR.description:
The Digimon Phelesmon, has promised to make the new kid Makoto popular.  Phelesmon is hypnotizing the students and it’s causing him to grow stronger.  With Tagiru and Taiki the only ones not hypnotized, are they strong enough to stop him?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tomodachi Hoshii? Phelesmon Akuma no Yakusoku
You Want Friends? Phelesmon, the Devil`s Promise
友だち欲しい? フェレスモン悪魔の約束

REGULAR.description:
An old phone rings and voice on the other end is asking for help.  Tagiru and Yuu go to check it out and run into the ghost hunter Kaoru.  Is the disturbance caused by a Digimon or something from the other side?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Thrilling Horror Experience! The Spirit Hunter`s Shout!!
Dokidoki Kyoufu Taiken! Shinrei Hunter ga Hoeru!!
ドキドキ恐怖体験! 心霊ハンターが吠える!!

REGULAR.description:
When the thief and master of disguises, Betsumon, shows up, Tagiru wants to Hunt him, but Gumdramon is unwilling. Even Ryouma and the other rival Hunters have fallen victim to Betsumon`s tricks, so Tagiru and company team up with them to stop him. Encouraged by Taiki, Gumdramon at last faces Betsumon in battle and reveals that the two of them used to be partners - but Betsumon no longer remembers him. Can Gumdramon recover his lost friendship with Betsumon?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Niteru? Nitenai? Hensou Kaitou Betsumon
Resemblance or None at All? The Thief in Disguise, Betsumon
似てる? 似てない? 変装怪盗ベツモン

REGULAR.description:
After being teased by his classmates about his drawings of UFOs and UMAs, Shouta meets the Digimon Ekakimon that has the ability to turn drawings to reality.  With Shouta’s powerful imagination, the school is in danger of being overrun by fearsome monsters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Great Gathering of UFOs and Dinosaurs! Ekakimon of Dreams
UFO Kyouryuu Daishuugou! Yume no Ekakimon
UFO・恐竜大集合! 夢のエカキモン

REGULAR.description:
Tagiru and company are enjoying a day of fishing at the beach when a Digimon Hunter, Mizuki, and her partner, Submarimon, appear. Mizuki, also a treasure hunter, tells them of a sunken treasure in a cave in DigiQuartz that she can`t reach because it`s guarded by an evil Digimon called Dagomon. She asks Tagiru and the others to Hunt Dagomon for her, so they follow her to the undersea cave, where they find much more than just Dagomon...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaitei Dai Bouken! Yume no Zaihou Digimon o Sagase!
The Great Undersea Adventure! Find the Treasure Digimon of Dreams!
海底大冒険! 夢の財宝デジモンを探せ!

REGULAR.description:
Hiroya strives for the top ranking in the card game Sea Monster Cards, but he`s not faring well without any strong rare cards. Then he meets KnightChessmon, a Digimon who promises to grant his wish. Later, Tagiru and his friends hear rumors of kids being dragged to another world where their rare cards are stolen. Suspecting a Digimon`s involvement, they head to a card game tournament to find the truth...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rare Card ga Kieta! Muteki no RookChessmon
The Rare Cards Have Disappeared! The Invincible RookChessmon
レアカードが消えた! 無敵のルークチェスモン

REGULAR.description:
When kids begin to disappear in large numbers, Taiki and Yuu suspect a Digimon`s involvement and set out to investigate. Tagiru then returns from a failed Digimon Hunt and meets Bakomon, a Digimon who has been inviting children to a theme park called DigimonLand. Tagiru and Gumdramon follow him there and find many other Digimon working hard to make children happy. They decide to put off their Hunt and join the fun, but the good times are cut short when Tagiru`s friends try out the special attraction and are not seen again...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Theme Park of Dreams, DigimonLand!
Yume no Yuuenchi, Digimon Land!
夢の遊園地, デジモンランド!

REGULAR.description:
Tagiru and Hideaki follow rumors of a shining golden stag beetle in the mountains, launching a Hunt when they suspect Digimon involvement. Meanwhile, Tagiru`s insect-loving classmate, Kaneda, is convinced that Tagiru is only trying to capture the new stag beetle species for profit, and won`t let him out of his sight. He ends up in DigiQuartz with Tagiru and Hideaki as they search for the truth behind the shining golden stag beetle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ougon Konchuu! MetallifeKuwagamon no Nazo
The Golden Insect! The Mystery of MetallifeKuwagamon
黄金昆虫! メタリフェクワガーモンの謎

REGULAR.description:
One morning Tagiru arrives at school only to find it transformed to DigiQuartz. He believes this to be the work of a Tsumemon he sees on the scene, but when he tries to catch it, it Digivolves to Keramon before his eyes. Ryouma appears and saves Tagiru, but Keramon escapes, transforming the town to DigiQuartz as it flees. Soon the whole town is transformed and its human residents gone. Finally Taiki calls Tagiru and Ryouma to a strategy meeting, where they puzzle over how a Digimon can Digivolve without a human partner, and how to save the humans who have been erased from the town...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ima Akasareru! Digimon Hunt no Himitsu!
Now Revealed! The Secret of the Digimon Hunt
今明かされる! デジモンハントの秘密!

REGULAR.description:
Legendary Digimon Heroes are assembling to battle against Quartzmon turning the human world digital. But one more hero is needed and Tagiru has to fight the other Hunters for the spot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Hero Daishuuketsu! Digimon All-Star Kessen!!
The Great Gathering of Legendary Heroes! The Digimon All-Stars Showdown!!
伝説のヒーロー大集結! デジモンオールスター決戦!!

REGULAR.description:
The truth is revealed and it is up to Tagiru and Arresterdramon to save the digital world and the real world.  But will the power of Brave Snatcher be enough to stop Quartzmon?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Get Fired Up, Tagiru! The Digimon Hunt for All the Glory!
Moeagare Tagiru! Eikou no Digimon Hunt!
燃え上がれタギル! 栄光のデジモンハント!
Digimon Xros Wars: Toki o Kakeru Shounen Hunter-tachi
Digimon Xros Wars: The Young Hunters Who Leapt Through Time
توکی او کاکرو شونن هانتر تاچی
デジモンクロスウォーズ 時を駆ける少年ハンターたち
数码兽合体战争 穿越时空的少年猎人们
Digimon Xros Wars III
digimon s8
digimon8
digixros s3
digixw3
Digimon Fusion II
Digimon Xros Wars: The Boy Hunters Who Leapt Through Time
جنگ های صلیبی دیجیمون : شکارچیان جوانی که در زمان پریدند
